name: Hyperborean Crossings/Rapsody A
description:
Hyperborean Crossings A tribute to myst series

Travel through space and time in an unprecedented adventure of 24 rapsodies that bind greek history with myths and modern science.

Delve into the unknown, alone, unassisted with only weapons your mind and your powers of observation.

In the first rapsody of this epic tale you are introduced in the world of Hyperborean Crossings.

A tale of legends,of revenge and rescue.
